Articles.Content:
My mom's visiting for Christmas, and she brought me a surprise.  One of my favorite toys from when I was a kid.  I was a typical 90s kid, collected pogs, but I was way more interesting in the rockets.  I've gotta clean these up, but they've probably got more play hours on them than the real things.

I've got a couple full sets of the pogs too, which look new.

 

Anyone else have these things?  I'd actually been missing them for awhile and was considering printing something similar.

Edited December 28, 2017 by Geonovast
